text: Heleno de Freitas (12 February 1920 - 8 November 1959) was a Brazilian footballer. He played as a forward. ==Honours== ===Club=== Botafogo * Copa Burgos: 1941 * Taça Prefeito Dr. Durval Neves da Rocha: 1942 * Campeonato Carioca de Amadores: 1942, 1943, 1944 * Campeonato Carioca de Aspirantes: 1944, 1945 * Torneio Inicio: 1947 Vasco da Gama * Campeonato Carioca: 1949 * Campeonato Carioca de Aspirantes: 1949 Santos * Quadrangular de Belo Horizonte: 1951 ===International=== Brazil * Roca Cup: 1945 * Copa Río Branco: 1947 * Copa América runner-up: 1945, 1946 * Copa Río Branco Runner-up: 1946, 1948 ===Individual=== * Campeonato Carioca top-scorer: 1942 * Copa América top-scorer: 1945 ==References== ==Other websites== * Heleno (2011): A Biographical Film directed by José Henrique Fonseca IMDb * Lover, Fighter, Jogador: The Unbelievable Life of Heleno de Freitas * * Article on Heleno, www.museudosesportes.com.br * Heleno Career Statistics, www.calcio.com ==Bibliography== * Category:1920 births Category:1959 deaths Category:Association football forwards Category:Footballers from Minas Gerais
title: Heleno de Freitas
